backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the Quran app backend with types and CRUD operations for Surahs, Ayahs, Juz mappings, and per-principal bookmarks stored in mutable lists and a map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking two implemented features—the Ramadan Prayer Timings screen and its route/navigation card—to their respective source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-sentence descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a human-readable index of the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining shadcn-compatible CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Quran PWA with mobile-optimized viewport, Islamic theme color, and a root div for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all app routes (home, surahs, reader, juz, settings, tasbeeh, prayer-timings) wrapped in a next-themes ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, exposing login/clear functions, identity state, and login status derived from DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping all backend actor calls (getSurahs, getSurah, getAyahs, getJuzIndex, getBookmark, saveBookmark) with caching and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts (Amiri Quran, Noto Nastaliq Urdu, Inter) and defining an Islamic green-and-gold OKLCH color system with semantic tokens for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page displaying a header with app branding, a continue-reading bookmark card, and navigation cards for Surah List, Juz Index, Tasbeeh, Prayer Timings, and Settings.
frontend/src/pages/JuzIndex.tsx: Page listing all 30 Juz with their names and starting surah/ayah, fetched via queries, with navigation to the reader on selection.
frontend/src/pages/PrayerTimings.tsx: Page displaying static Ramadan prayer times (Suhoor, Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, Isha) for all 30 days of Ramadan in a table-style layout.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page allowing users to toggle between light and dark themes using next-themes, with a visual theme preview and an about section.
frontend/src/pages/SurahList.tsx: Page listing all 114 Surahs with search filtering by name or number, navigating to the reader when a surah is selected.
frontend/src/pages/SurahReader.tsx: React page component that displays a Quran surah with its ayahs, supporting bookmarking, smooth scroll-to-bookmark on load, and previous/next surah navigation.
frontend/src/pages/TasbeehCounter.tsx: React page component implementing a digital tasbeeh (dhikr) counter with a circular progress ring, tap-to-count interaction, cycle tracking, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom Islamic-green and gold color palettes, Arabic/Urdu font families, semantic page tokens, and standard shadcn-style design tokens using OKLCH colors.
project_state.json: JSON file tracking the overall project state, including version, feature list, architectural notes, and known issues for a Quran mobile web application.
